Hello, we are happy to present a redesigned editing interface in Animation Desk. Not only so, we also add in some new features,
-A timeline that shows users an overview of a sequence of frames
-Ruler to create perfect straight lines, circles, squares, and triangles
-Zoom-in and zoom-out rate increased
-Canvas rotation
-Color palette saving
-Selection tool enhanced

We hope you like this new update as we do.
